heroSubtitle: A 2‑minute quiz that turns how you’ve been feeling into a playful Glowtype card.
heroHint: No login, no diagnosis, just something light to play with.
heroCardSubtitle: Answer a few questions and get a shareable Glowtype card at the end.
step1Title: Pick what feels most like you
step1Body: You’ll see short everyday situations instead of heavy questions.
step2Body: Your choices shape a soft picture of how you usually move through feelings.
step3Body: A playful "personality" card you can save, screenshot or just keep for yourself.
whatItIsBody: Glowtype is a playful reflection tool, not medical advice. It helps you find lighter words for your inner world, not stick labels on you.
safetyPreviewBody: You can use Glowtype without logging in. We avoid ad tracking and try to keep what you share as private as reasonably possible.
safetyPreviewExtra: If anything feels too much, you can always close the tab. No streaks, no pressure.
